item.title: 意大利私营部门增速为 2024 年以来最慢
item.description: 由于制造业的改善不足以弥补服务业的放缓，意大利经济活动降至 2024 年的最低点。【原文：Italian economic activity dropped to a 2024 low as an improvement in the manufacturing sector wasn’t enough to compensate a slowdown in services.】

item.title: 以色列股市因担心伊朗发动袭击而扩大跌幅
item.description: 受伊朗和地区民兵可能袭击以色列的担忧以及全球市场更广泛的避险情绪影响，以色列股市创下 10 月份以来最大跌幅。【原文：Israeli stocks tumbled the most since October, hit by concerns over a possible attack on the country by Iran and regional militias, as well as wider risk aversion across global markets.】

item.title: 德国汽车制造商因电动车转型放缓和中国市场低迷而情绪低落
item.description: 在经历了一个令人失望的财报季后，德国汽车制造商的前景愈发黯淡，这一季的特点是电动汽车销量下降，以及包括大众汽车公司和梅赛德斯-奔驰集团在内的公司在中国市场的疲软。【原文：Germany’s carmakers are growing gloomier about their prospects after a disappointing earnings season marked by waning electric-vehicle sales and weakness in China for companies including Volkswagen AG and Mercedes-Benz Group AG.】

item.title: 软银集团股价创 1998 年上市以来最大跌幅
item.description: 本周一，日本股市暴跌，软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：A stock rout in Japan wiped out $15 billion of SoftBank Group Corp.’s value on Monday, after the company’s biggest single-day fall since founder Masayoshi Son took the company public in 1998.】

item.title: 据说玛氏考虑收购全球零食制造商 Kellanova
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，玛氏公司正在考虑收购零食生产商 Kellanova，这可能是今年消费行业最大的交易之一。【原文：Mars Inc., the closely held US confectionary company, is considering buying snack-maker Kellanova, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be one of the biggest deals in the consumer industry this year.】

item.title: 土耳其消费者通胀以 2022 年以来最迅猛的速度放缓
item.description: 土耳其的总体通胀率在 7 月份出现了近两年来的最大降幅，通胀放缓的主要原因是基数效应，而官员们在关注价格面临的更直接风险时可能会忽略这一点。【原文：Turkey’s headline inflation saw the sharpest drop in nearly two years in July, a slowdown largely due to base effects that officials may overlook as they focus on more immediate risks to prices.】

item.title: Sidara 以风险上升为由终止伍德集团收购谈判
item.description: 工程公司西达拉（Sidara）表示，它不会对约翰-伍德集团（John Wood Group Plc）提出明确的收购要约，从而结束了长达数月的求购过程。【原文：Engineering company Sidara said it won’t make a firm takeover offer for John Wood Group Plc, ending a months-long courtship.】

item.title: 伯克希尔减持近一半股份后苹果供应商股票暴跌
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.这一股价下跌是在周一市场大跌的背景下发生的。【原文：The shares of Apple Inc.’s suppliers slumped after Berkshire Hathaway Inc. nearly halved its stake in the iPhone maker. The decline came amid a broad market selloff Monday.】

item.title: 季风降雨有助于印度农民种植更多水稻和豆类
item.description: 印度农民扩大了水稻和豆类的种植面积，这得益于四个月季风季节前半段高于平均水平的降雨量。【原文：India’s farmers expanded planted areas for rice and pulses, helped by higher-than-average rains during the first half of the four-month monsoon season.】

item.title: 欧莱雅将收购瑞士护肤品公司 Galderma 10% 的股份
item.description: 欧莱雅集团（L'Oreal SA）表示，它将收购瑞士护肤品公司高德美集团（Galderma Group AG）10%的股份，以受益于高德美集团的皮肤科产品系列。【原文：L’Oreal SA said it’s buying a 10% stake in Swiss skincare company Galderma Group AG to benefit from its range of dermatological products.】

item.description:

item.title: 台积电领跌台湾，指数遭遇 57 年来最糟糕一天
item.description: 台湾基准股指暴跌，创下历史新高，由于担心美国经济进一步放缓，科技股首当其冲遭到抛售。【原文：Taiwan’s benchmark stock index plunged by a record, as the tech-heavy gauge took the brunt of a selloff triggered by fear of a deeper US economic slowdown.】

item.title: 投资者摆脱限制，印度债券获得 10 亿美元资金流入
item.description: 上周，有资格被纳入指数的印度政府债券的海外资金流入量创下历史新高，这表明印度央行对这些证券的限制几乎没有影响投资者的情绪。【原文：Indian government bonds eligible for index inclusion saw the highest-ever overseas inflows last week, suggesting the central bank’s curbs on the securities have done little to dampen investor sentiment.】

item.title: 日元反弹加剧令日本股市下挫，全球市场震荡不安
item.description: 周一，日本金融市场动荡加剧，日元兑美元汇率从7月份的低点反弹至近13%，股市走向熊市。基准日本国债收益率创下二十年来最大跌幅。【原文：Turmoil in Japan’s financial markets intensified Monday as the yen extended its rebound against the dollar to almost 13% from July’s low and stocks headed for a bear market. Yields on benchmark Japanese government bonds tumbled by the most in two decades.】

item.title: 减产后阿美投资者错失石油股反弹良机
item.description: 今年，一些主要石油生产商的股价屡创新高，而沙特阿美公司的股价却反其道而行之。【原文：In a year when shares of some major oil producers have hit records, Saudi Aramco’s stock has gone the other way.】

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特因资金流入和乐观情绪而创下 2015 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 由于对马来西亚经济持乐观态度，外资纷纷涌入，林吉特创下九年来最大涨幅。【原文：The ringgit jumped the most in nine years, amid bets foreign capital will flood in amid optimism surrounding Malaysia’s economy.】

item.title: 德意志银行向私人信贷基金出售煤矿贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已将用于澳大利亚煤矿收购融资的 6 亿美元贷款的一部分出售给一些私人信贷基金。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has sold a portion of a $600 million loan being used to finance an Australian coal mine’s acquisition to some private credit funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 曲线趋平，摩根资产对中国债券狂热降温
item.description: 随着收益率不断创下历史新低，中国债券的持续反弹至少让一位全球投资者暂停了投资。【原文：A relentless rally in Chinese bonds has at least one global investor taking pause as yields continue to plumb record lows.】

item.title: MUFG 跌幅创纪录，日本银行价值损失 850 亿美元
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.）和瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. and Mizuho Financial Group Inc.’s shares fell the most on record on Monday as a stock-market rout sent Japanese banks tumbling.】

item.title: 中国酷热难耐，上海电力需求创纪录
item.description: 中国南方各地酷热难耐，给电力网络和农田带来压力，极端天气继续给世界第二大经济体造成致命损失。【原文：Punishing heat throughout southern China is stressing power networks and farmland as extreme weather continues to exact a deadly toll in the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 人民币升值突破中国人民银行每日指导线，熊市逃离
item.description: 由于交易商急于放弃一度流行的做空策略，离岸人民币自 11 月以来首次通过中国每日参考汇率走强。【原文：The offshore yuan strengthened through China’s daily reference rate for the first time since November, as traders rushed to abandon a once popular short strategy.】

item.title: 强制保证金抛售加剧日本市场疲软
item.description: 日本股市的迅速下滑很可能引发了散户投资者的大规模被迫抛售，从而加深了股市的溃败。【原文：The swift downturn in the Japanese stock market likely triggered a massive wave of forced selling among retail investors, deepening the rout.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数下跌后，波动率期货面临关键拐点
item.description: 股市波动性的一个标志是，过去 S&P 500 指数处于一个接近短期底部的水平。【原文：One marker of stock-market volatility is at a level that in the past has signaled the S&P 500 Index was close to a near-term bottom.】

item.title: 中国服务业扩张步伐加快，彰显新动能
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国服务业的扩张速度为5月份以来最快，这表明中国经济的韧性可能会减轻人们在官方数据疲软之后对经济前景的担忧。【原文：China’s services sector expanded at its fastest pace since May, a private survey showed, pointing to resilience that may alleviate concerns over the economy’s outlook after weak official figures.】

item.title: 印度公司在税收规则改变之前为回购潮做好准备
item.description: 在新的回购税收规定于 10 月 1 日生效之前，印度的公司正在为未来几周增加股票回购做准备。【原文：Companies in India are gearing up for increase in share buybacks in the coming weeks before new tax rules on repurchases take effect on Oct. 1.】

item.title: 卢比将继续下探新低，政策中枢成为关注焦点
item.description: 印度卢比从年初亚洲新兴货币中表现最好的货币一跃成为本季度表现最差的货币之一，而且跌势可能还会延续。【原文：The Indian rupee slumped from emerging Asia’s best-performing currency at the start of the year to among the worst this quarter, and the decline will likely extend.】

item.title: 美国经济前景黯淡，全球债券收复今年失地
item.description: 由于对美国经济前景迅速恶化的担忧刺激了对固定收益资产的需求，全球债券收复了今年的失地。【原文：Global bonds have erased their losses for the year as concern the US economic outlook is rapidly worsening spurs demand for fixed-income assets.】
